name: SKYDOT demo/prototype
description:
A teeny tiny demo that I whipped up in gamemaker for a class

Mechanics and systems: A 2d platformer adventure game and a text-based interactive fiction piece operating in parallel. Interact with the game world through a twine-like text interface.

Controls: WASD to move about, Left click on objects or links to interact. Tab toggles fullscreen, esc to quit.

Please give me feedback, comments and criticisms!

Made in GameMaker Studio
